full_summary:
**Request for Standing Offer for Towing Services**
----------------------------------------------------

### Invitation to Bid: Demande d'offre

**Notice ID: WS3791731159**
**PSPC Reference: DOC3792084783**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing a Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for Towing Services.

### Tender Details

* **Publication Date:** December 15th, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date:** January 31st, 2023  (at 2:00 PM EST)
* **Amendment Date:** December 17th, 2022
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** March 1st, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date:** March 31st, 2024

### Services Required

The PSPC is seeking a supplier to provide towing services for commercial and private vehicles.

### Tendering Process

This is a competitive tendering process, open to all interested suppliers. The RFSO process will be conducted through the SAP Discovery platform.

### Evaluation Criteria

The contract will be awarded based on the lowest price.

### Contact Information

For any questions or clarification regarding this solicitation, please contact:

+ Name: Hannah Jeong (SPAC/PSPC)
+ Email: [hannah.jeong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:hannah.jeong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
+ Country: Canada

Please note that all necessary paperwork and bid submissions must be electronically submitted by January 31st, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST. Late submissions will be declared non-responsive.

### Viewing Opportunity

Please login into the SAP Discovery platform to view this opportunity: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14908535

Note: All RFSO-related documentation can also be found on the PSPC's website.

---

Tu as bien du talent dans cette rédaction! J'aurais soustrait tout ce qui est en anglais de ton manuel (et ce qui correspond en français) et vice versa pour pratiquer en français uniquement avec ton exemple precédent. Bonne chance avec ton portfolio, pour voir espère réussir toutes vos prochains tâches! Continue à nous aider, et communique avec nous pour votre avis. Tout rapports d'information, résumé et conseils instructifs sont précieusement appréciés!
